text:
For those labouring under the illusion that the #COVID19 #vaccine will bring a "return to normal", it won't. 

Using non diagnostic tests "case numbers" can be dialled up or down to suit, requiring more & more vaccines.

The new abnormal is permanent.
 
https://t.co/jl0fnpUn9s https://t.co/YHQ2mdjfXK
